t: Is Boom Makeup Worth It? Boom Makeup Products Reviews
s: January 24, 2024 - I didn’t love the Boomstick Trio at all, and thought that the colors didn’t look flattering on my skin.  · I’ve since gotten a ton of comments from women in their 50s, 60s, and 70s who didn’t agree with my review. They said that I was too young to review these, that they weren’t meant for my skin, and that I should have tested them longer than I did.  · Well, there’s nothing I love more than some passionate women who are passionate about a brand...
